abstract: A beauty brought to us by Kevin G. Der
snippet: A beauty brought to us by Kevin G. Der
lead_paragraph: SATURDAY’S PUZZLE — The one thing that really jumps out at me when looking at this grid is the abundance of less-common letters, in many cases two, three or even four of them in the same word. I can almost hear Kevin Der giving some sort of cruciverbal speech for this puzzle: “I couldn’t done it without the valuable contributions of J, Q, W, B, X, C, Z and two letters that have been with me from the very beginning, K and V.”

headline.main: 45 Across: Turning Up on the Farm?
